meanings: give four hundred won in change

vlive.korean: 그 대신 거스름돈 잘 가져와야 해! But you have to bring back the change! 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 김종민&유재환 아이들과 행복한 먹방 타임 <우리 아빠가 생겼어요3> 4회
vlive.english: But you have to bring back the change!

vlive.korean: 거스름 돈 주시면 되고. Give them the change. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 더 보이즈 '꽃미남 분식집' 3회 The BOYZ "Flower Snack" ep.3
감사합니다. 거스름돈을 받고... Thank you. I got changes. 듣기 View video HAPPYFACE : [Dalshabet] 수빈 '이 곳' 회사 근처에서 생방
거스름돈 6천 원이고요. I received a change of 6,000 won. 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7의 하드캐리 7화 (GOT7's Hard Carry ep.7)
vlive.english: I received a change of 6,000 won.

vlive.korean: 네. - 1,960원 거스름돈 드립니다. Okay. - 1,960 KRW is your change. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 여자친구가 사랑한 유럽 EP.01 Part.1

examples.korean: The ticket machine gives change. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 티켓 발매기에서 거스름돈이 나온다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ticket machine gives change. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I think I’ve been short-changed at the bar. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 술집에서 거스름돈을 덜 받았나 봐. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I think I’ve been short-changed at the bar. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘Here’s the change.’ ‘Thanks very much.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “이거 거스름돈이에요.” “네, 고마워요.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Here’s the change.’ ‘Thanks very much.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The clerk at the counter gave me too little change. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 계산대 직원이 나에게 거스름돈을 너무 적게 내주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The clerk at the counter gave me too little change. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Don’t forget your change! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 거스름돈 잊지 마세요! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
